short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't let the internet trap you!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app will make your internet life better. It blocks you from getting distracted when using the internet and helps you be productive. It does so by blocking all the recommendations that websites make for you. It also provides you with one-click functions that usually require navigating multiple pages. It mainly covers social media websites and will extend to numerous other websites as well. Our motto is to make your internet life easy and peaceful and give you back your control of time.
